# [Interview #1181: Little City Books-AU Tour, Entry #34](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1181#34)

#### yulerule

Do you actually need to physically inhale or can you like cognitively inhale. Can you think about inhaling without actually inhaling.

#### Brandon Sanderson

This is possible.

#### Question

Think about breathing

#### Brandon Sanderson

That would be fine
